present.english: I think about the difficult problem
The young student thinks about the new lesson
The experienced workers think about the ideal solution

imperfect.english: I was thinking about the difficult problem
The young student was thinking about the new lesson
The experienced workers were thinking about the ideal solution

future.english: I will think about the difficult problem
The young student will think about the new lesson
The experienced workers will think about the ideal solution

aorist.english: I thought about the difficult problem
The young student thought about the new lesson
The experienced workers thought about the ideal solution

optative.english: I should think about the difficult problem

optative.georgian: ახალგაზრდა სტუდენტმა ახალი გაკვეთილი უნდა იფიქროს
optative.english: The young student should think about the new lesson

optative.georgian: გამოცდილმა მუშებმა იდეალური გადაწყვეტა უნდა იფიქრონ
optative.english: The experienced workers should think about the ideal solution

imperative.english: You, think about the important question
You all (you formal), think about the simple plan
